xyz.fsgik.common.base

类 FsBytesBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream
        • xyz.fsgik.common.base.FsBytesBuilder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class FsBytesBuilder
extends java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream
    Builder for building bytes, extension of ByteArrayOutputStream. Just like StringBuilder but it is used for byte-string.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream

        buf, count

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      FsBytesBuilder()
      Constructs with default settings.
      FsBytesBuilder(int size)
      Constructs with specified initialized size.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      FsBytesBuilder append(byte b)
      Appends a byte into this builder.
      FsBytesBuilder append(byte[] bytes)
      Appends given bytes into this builder.
      FsBytesBuilder append(byte[] bytes, int offset, int length)
      Appends given bytes of specified length from given offset into this builder.
      FsBytesBuilder append(java.nio.ByteBuffer bytes)
      Appends given byte buffer into this builder.
      java.nio.ByteBuffer toByteBuffer()
      Builds to byte array and wraps as byte buffer.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream

        close, reset, size, toByteArray, toString, toString, toString, write, write, writeTo

      • append

        public FsBytesBuilder append(byte[] bytes,
                             int offset,
                             int length)
        Appends given bytes of specified length from given offset into this builder.
        参数:
        bytes - given bytes
        offset - given offset
        length - specified length
        返回:
        this builder

      • append

        public FsBytesBuilder append(java.nio.ByteBuffer bytes)
        Appends given byte buffer into this builder.
        参数:
        bytes - given byte buffer
        返回:
        this builder

      • toByteBuffer

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer toByteBuffer()
        Builds to byte array and wraps as byte buffer. It is equivalent to: 
             return ByteBuffer.wrap(toByteArray());
        返回:
        wrapped byte buffer
